config.cant_download_file: {USER_MENTION} I couldn't grab that file, is another bot deleting the file?
config.cant_delete_message: {USER_MENTION} I Couldn't delete your message! You might want to delete it yourself.
config.incorrect_guild_id:
{USER_MENTION} Incorrect guild ID in your config!

Are you uploading it to the right server?
config.get_config:
{USER_MENTION} here you go!

*This message will self-destruct in 15 seconds*
config.get_default_config:
{USER_MENTION} here you go!

**WARNING**: This is the default config, you did not have a config previously saved!
**It is HIGHLY RECOMMENDED to start from a empty config instead!**

*This message will self-destruct in 15 seconds*
config.deleted_config:
{USER_MENTION} done!

Feel free to request a new config by typing `.config.`

tags.cant_edit_others: You may not edit other user's tags!
tags.tag_not_found: There is no tag with that name!

show.no_tag_found: No tag found with that name

set.name_length: Tag name must be between 2 and 20 characters in length and may only contain alphanumeric characters!
set.content_length: Tag content may only be up to {MAX_LENGTH} characters in size!

utilities.time_improper: ❌ Time improperly formatted! Please use `1h30m` formatting

reminders.remind_message:
Hey {USER_MENTION}! You asked me at `{TIME_UTC} UTC` ({TIME_AGO} ago) to remind you about:
`{REMINDER_TEXT}`
reminders.reminder_time_limit: ❌ Time must be between 2 minutes and a month
reminders.reminder_count_limit: ❌ You already have 10 active reminders, you may not define any more!
reminders.no_reminders: ❌ You don't have any active reminders!

curs.dont_have_role: ❌ You do not have a custom role!
curs.check_role_slash:
Your custom role is: {ROLE_MENTION}>
To set the name of it, type **/**`cur name <name>`
To set the color, type **/**`cur color <color>`
curs.character_limit: ❌ New name must be between 2 and 32 characters in size!
curs.color_wrong_format: ❌ Color must be formatted as a hex string! (for example `#ff0000`)
